name: render aggregate_metric_double when missing min and max

body.query:
FROM test4
| EVAL a = TO_AGGREGATE_METRIC_DOUBLE(1)  // Temporary workaround to enable aggregate_metric_double
| KEEP agg_metric

headers.warning: 299 Elasticsearch-9.2.0-9316d644f0d45e9fcdcd827f2c63b26cbc211742 "No limit defined, adding default limit of [1000]"
